ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We gratefully acknowledge Ursula Sauder and the team at the Microscopy Center (University of Basel) for transmission electron microscopy. We thank the staff of Tvärminne Research station, Jürgen Hottinger and Urs Stiefel for support in the laboratory. We also thank Maria Joao Amorim, Darren Obbard and Trevor Williams for helpful discussions in the early parts of this project and Louis Du Pasquier for discussions of the results. In addition, we thank our colleagues in the Ebert group for critical reading of the manuscript. This work was supported by an ERC advanced investigator grant and a grant by the Swiss National Science Foundation to DE. ERT was supported by an Erwin Schrödinger fellowship of the Austrian Science Fund (project J 3564-B22). The funders had no role in the design of the study, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
